column1: 30304,Amazing Spider-Man (1999) #629,629,53560,19,"SOMETHING CAN STOP THE JUGGERNAUT, PART 3 Spider-Man and Juggernaut are trapped in an unearthly realm by a being of mind-bending power. But who is their tormentor? What's his connection with Spider-Man? And why does he hate the Juggernaut? ",
